nodes.text: Doxet was one of four continents on the planet of Lazerian IV.

It was located on the planet's eastern hemisphere, surrounded by the Caz Ocean to the west and the Dox Ocean to the east. The terrain was mostly made up of plains, with forests covering the middle of the continent, while a wild and barren mountain range covered the southern end. The continent was ruled by the independent city-state of Doxeti, although the King of Devit had a private estate near Crystal Valley
